review.title: “Why Rage is a great career option”
review.pros: Pros – Rage blends the old with the new. As one of the few companies to offer the intellectual stimulation of consulting with the satisfaction of accomplishment that comes with execution, Rage provides an opportunity for its employees to see for themselves the results of their efforts and the value they add. Rage is an open, growing organisation that has enough opportunity for personal growth and development.
review.cons: Cons – Nothing I can think of.
review.advice-to-management: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
